name: Minesweeper Chest (Android & Win)
description:
With Minesweeper Chest you can play classic minesweeper in a fantasy world.

Minesweeper Chest is a puzzle game whose objective is to locate mines hidden in chests with the only indication the number of bombs in adjacent areas.

Minesweeper Chest operation:

- Press quickly on a chest to open, it contain indications or bomb if it is trapped! If you open a chest containing a bomb, the game is lost. If the box contains indications, all the right boxes around will open and tell you the location of the trapped chests closest.

- Long press on a box to mark it as bomb (red box) if you think it contains a bomb. Repeat to mark it as dangerous (small sign in front of the box) in case of doubt. Redone last a long pressed to return the trunk to its original state (yellow box).

- If you can open all the right boxes without dying, you win the game!

- The playing area is larger than the screen, leave your finger pressed and move to navigate the area.

Features for Android Minesweeper:

- 4 card sizes: small, medium, large and giant

- Party of the day: one try to make the best time on a common card for all players

- Global Scores, share your best times online

- Save and resume your game
